Gude bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Naịjirịa na Adamawa Steeti na Mubi LGA ya na Borno Steeti na Askira-Uba LGA
A na-asụkwa ya na agbata-obi Cameroon  A na-asụ asụsụ dị iche iche na Naịjirịa na Cameroon.
A na-asụ Gude n'akụkụ ndịda nke obodo Bourrha (Mayo-Tsanaga department, Far North Region) na njedebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke mpaghara Mayo-Oulo (Mayo'Louti department, North Region)
Ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri abụọ na asatọ na-asụ ya.
